SELECT count(*) FROM springboot.source s LEFT JOIN springboot.user u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.delete_flag = 0
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND s.type = #{type}
AND s.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{url},'%')

SELECT s1.id, s1.create_by, s1.create_time, s1.delete_flag, s1.update_by, s1.update_time, s1.source_name, s1.type, s1.url, s1.sort, s1.user_id, s1.desc_content, s1.apply_status, s1.v_id, s1.user_ids, s1.create_ids, s1.update_ids, s2.real_url, s2.url AS vUrl FROM springboot.source s1 LEFT JOIN springboot.source s2 ON s1.v_id = s2.id WHERE s1.delete_flag = 0 AND s1.id = #{id}
